import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; // Assuming you're using Bootstrap for styles export default function Menu({ items }) { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1); const [varient, setVarient] = useState(items.variants[0]); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return (

{items.name}

Variants

Quantity

Price: {items.prices[0][varient] * quantity} Rs/-

{items.name}

{items.description}
); }
